name: WhoStoleWinter
description:
Who Stole Winter

This is my 2D Platformer project. I added the following elements:

  1. Redraw main menu planet png file
  2. Add dialog page between 'main menu' and 'level1'
    1. You can try this with 'Start Game' Button
  3. In dialog page, some new script added
  4. Modify level1 difficulty and Add level2
  5. And, there are minimal fixes

Credits

Created by HanA Kim (a.k.a Rindid)
